summary: Implements a 3-page client-side flow (proposal → celebration → future family) with Page 1 evasive “No” behavior, Page 2 autoplay audio + sequential image popup then grid + glass overlay, and Page 3 hero image + caption. However, the required static generated assets are not evidenced in the diff summary, and an unrequested footer attribution/link was added on Page 3.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required static assets to the frontend static asset directory (frontend/public/assets/generated) and ensure they are referenced directly by the frontend without routing images/audio through the backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The pages reference files under /assets/generated, but the diff summary does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code files are listed). Without those assets present, the requirement/AC cannot be verified from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a footer with © year, a heart icon, and an external attribution link to caffeine.ai on Page 3.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request any footer attribution or external link; only the hero image and exact caption text are required for Page 3.
